main event: A bright silver ball, slightly oblong with a Saturn-like silver ring around it, was observed drifting northeast over a period of about one minute.
interesting points: The object was sighted visually and had no sound.
The object disappeared in a northeasterly direction.
A weather balloon was launched from Santa Monica Airport around the same time, and the winds and altitude suggest it could have been the object sighted.
The sighting was reported to the 552d Command Post at Edwards Air Force Base.
The observer was Mrs. ____ and the report was sent to Air Technical Intelligence Center (ATIC) at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
sighted object: Bright silver ball, slightly oblong with a Saturn-like silver ring around it
photographs: No photographs were included in the report.
